body:
Hello Everyone,



I'm trying to do a cumultative radiation analyses. Something is going wrong in my generate cumultative sky and/or the selected sky matrix components. The selected sky matrix give a KeyError (1, ) for each of the skypatches. Also the cmd window for the cumultative sky matrix opens but doesn't give the familiar message. Instead it closes within a second before I have time to see what it says. I've done everything which was recommended for this same problem in this [thread](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/radiation-issues?groupUrl=ladybug), that is: I set the useOldres to off and replace gendaymtx with the one from github. 

Does anyone have any other suggestions? 



Thanks,



Sam

replies.body:
Hi Samuel,

Have you also unblocked the .exe file?

If that didn't work can you add a pause at the end of batch file and run it manually and report back the error? The file should be under 'ladybugDefaultFolder'\'cityName'\'cityName.bat'

Mostapha

Hi Mostapha, 



Thanks!! That did the trick. Sorry; I could have thought about that one myself. 



Gr,



Sam



P.S.: Thanks also for all the new components which have been added. Lately things have been developing faster than I can keep up with.
